data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Niitsuma, Hiromi, Tang, Hongqu (2019): Taxonomic review of Ablabesmyia Johannsen (Diptera: Chironomidae: Tanypodinae) from Oriental China, with descriptions of six new species. Zootaxa 4564 (1): 248-270, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4564.1.9|37 occurrences
